front.title: SIP Forum - Message Body in SIP REGISTER Message

abstract.t: In SIP, Register never carries any message body, but a lot of things can be simplified by allowing the one. User can configure their call preferences at any moment by just sending a Register message. In present scenario when users are becoming more and more demanding it's perfectly logical to allow them to configure their call preferences dynamically. The present draft present two such call preferences requested by user - call barging and advertising unavailability. It can, however, be extended for other scenarios as well.
